eurecom.web.service

Class LOV4IoTWS

  • java.lang.Object
    • eurecom.web.service.LOV4IoTWS

  • public class LOV4IoTWS
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Gyrard Amelie To query the LOV4IoT RDF dataset Mainly used for statistics, to count the total number of ontologies, the number of ontology by domain, according to their status, etc.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getNumberOntologyByDomain(java.lang.String domain)
      Execute a SPARQL query to count the different ontologies in all domains Last updated February 25th 2015
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getOntologyStatus(java.lang.String status)
      Execute a SPARQL query to count the different status of ontologies Last updated February 2nd 2015
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTotalNumberOntology()
      Execute a SPARQL query to count the total number of ontology-based project referenced in the LOV4IoT RDF dataset Last updated January 29th 2015
      static javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendEmail(java.lang.String recipient, java.lang.String paper)
      The LOV4IOT bot to send email to encourage people to share their domain knowledge (ontologies, datasets, and rules)

      • getTotalNumberOntology

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTotalNumberOntology()
        Execute a SPARQL query to count the total number of ontology-based project referenced in the LOV4IoT RDF dataset Last updated January 29th 2015
        Parameters:
        -
        Returns:
        the number of ontologies referenced in the LOV4IoT RDF dataset E.g., http://sensormeasurement.appspot.com/lov4iot/totalOnto/

      • getOntologyStatus

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getOntologyStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Execute a SPARQL query to count the different status of ontologies Last updated February 2nd 2015
        Parameters:
        -
        Returns:
        the number of ontologies referenced in the LOV4IoT RDF dataset according to their status E.g., http://sensormeasurement.appspot.com/lov4iot/ontoStatus/?status=Online

      • getNumberOntologyByDomain

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getNumberOntologyByDomain(java.lang.String domain)
        Execute a SPARQL query to count the different ontologies in all domains Last updated February 25th 2015
        Parameters:
        -
        Returns:
        the number of ontologies in each domain referenced in the LOV4IoT RDF dataset according E.g., http://sensormeasurement.appspot.com/lov4iot/nbOntoDomain/?domain=BuildingAutomation

      • sendEmail

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendEmail(java.lang.String recipient,
                                  java.lang.String paper)
        The LOV4IOT bot to send email to encourage people to share their domain knowledge (ontologies, datasets, and rules)
        Parameters:
        recipient: - email of the author, creator of the domaoin knowledge
        paper: - title of the research article that we are intereted in where they mentionned ontologies, rules relevant for Internet of Things
        Returns:
